thread.title: FEATURE: Sammy Kuffour will not succeed while Asante Kotoko is still in traditional prison
thread.title_full: FEATURE: Sammy Kuffour will not succeed while Asante Kotoko is still in traditional prison

title: FEATURE: Sammy Kuffour will not succeed while Asante Kotoko is still in traditional prison
text:
16:40 CET FEATURE: Sammy Kuffour will not succeed while Asante Kotoko is still in traditional prison Sammy Kuffour 
By: Sheikh Tophic Sienu @desheikh1 on twitter 
Osei Kuffour will be the worse Kotoko CEO if the direction of the club remains the same. He has a positive mindset and I like his optimism but …… I think Kuffour is not at the right club. Yes. If things will continue the way they are, then he is at the wrong club. 
For more Ghana football news visit www.ghanasoccernet.com
